name: Arrange Them Little Right
description:
This is a simple yet addictive and entertaining game. This game helps you to organize and arrange your living space with ease. Sharpen your mind with this Hexa A little left puzzle game. Enjoy this classic puzzle game with more than hundreds of beautiful & alluring graphics. If you are a fun lover & like these sorts of puzzle games then you will surely gonna love these little left puzzles! A great mind relaxing exercise.

How To Play:
- A blank graphic will appear in front of you on the screen.
- Multiple puzzles will be there to choose & select in the right place.
- You will drag the puzzle & place it in the accurate blank place.
- All the puzzle assembles in the right way and the charming image will be completed.
- If the selected puzzle is not right you are supposed to choose this again to paste it in the right place.
- If you are unable to fill out the puzzles you can click on the “Watch Ad” & have the clue where to place it in the right way.
Features:
- One Finger drag & drop control game.
- Attractive graphics.
- Clues provided.
- Use hints to solve puzzles that are hard to solve.
- Over 1000+ Logical puzzles.
- Enjoyable for all ages.

Perfect for people who enjoy playing casual puzzle games and who find the organization to be gratifying. You can play this casual logical puzzle game on your mobile phones & tablets online as well as offline.
Get ready to create a cozy, clean, and sophisticated home with this fantastic app!
